application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Conditions 2(b) (Submission of details - Alterations to existing coal chutes) and 3 (Submission of details - Damp investigations and damp-proofing works) of Listed Building Consent LB/21/03597 (Listed building consent to accompany a minor material amendment application to approved planning application PP/08/00537 to allow: correction of roof plan inconsistencies; realignment of skylight; reduction in lower basement area; lowering of part of basement by 0.35m; provision of additional door onto terrace; omission of approved north entrance to approved east extension; replacement of approved glass panels with brick; additional internal alterations and reconfiguration)
